name: keila
description: Keila is an open source email marketing and newsletter tool. It enables list management, campaign design and sending, and basic analytics, providing a self hosted alternative for small organizations that want control over subscriber data.
features: Email Campaigns: Create and send newsletters with visual template editor. Send professional emails to subscribers.
List Management: Organize subscribers into lists with import and export tools. Manage your audience effectively.
Campaign Scheduling: Schedule emails for optimal delivery times and automate sends. Plan campaigns in advance.
Template Editor: Design email templates with drag-and-drop or HTML editing. Create beautiful newsletters easily.
Analytics: Track open rates, click-through rates, and campaign performance. Measure email marketing success.
Segmentation: Target specific subscriber groups with custom segments. Send relevant content to audiences.
Double Opt-In: Confirm subscriptions with double opt-in workflow. Maintain clean subscriber lists.
Unsubscribe Management: Automatic unsubscribe handling and preference centers. Respect subscriber choices.
SMTP Integration: Connect to any SMTP server or email service provider. Use your preferred email delivery.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Own your data with GDPR-compliant, self-hosted solution. Control subscriber information completely.
API Access: Programmatic campaign management and subscriber operations. Integrate with existing systems.
Multi-User: Team accounts with role-based permissions for collaboration. Manage campaigns together.
